name: StorageGenie
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: storage genie
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The OpenTech Alliance IoE intelligent platform of smart connected self-storage solutions and Alexa allows storage operators to perform commands and receive information about their facility by using voice commands.

If you have any questions, please visit the OpenTech IoE Control Center Help, contact OpenTech Support at (602) 773-1700 or e-mail IoESupport@opentechalliance.com.
